structure.unit: ARTICLE F. - TRANSIENT OCCUPANCY TAX; CONVENTION AND VISITORS BUREAU
Sec. 2-2083. - PENALTY FOR FAILURE TO FILE RETURN.

law.catch_line: PENALTY FOR FAILURE TO FILE RETURN.
law.text: Any person, firm, corporation, or association which fails or refuses to file the return required by this division shall pay a penalty of ten dollars ($10.00) for each day's omission. (Ord. No. 1986-825A, ยง1, 7-15-86)
